content: you will be doing a yarn over increase after and before the center markers creating a sort of rounded back 8 k 9 increase row 10 k 11 increase row 12 k 13 increase row 14 k 15 increase row 16 k 17 increase row for cowl skip to row 25 once row 17 is complete 18 k 19 k 20 increase row for big cowl skip to row 25 once row 20 is complete 21 k 22 k 23 increase row 24 k 25 p 26 increase row 27 p loosely bind off all stitches use a larger needle if you have one
